title: At Televised Meet, Putin's Scary Revelation; Alarmed UN Watchdog Rushes | Nuclear | Kursk | Ukraine | Hindustan Times
text: Explore Search Friday, Aug 23, 2024 New Delhi o C Subscribe Games E-Paper Sign in My Account Home HT Premium Loan â‚¹ 10 Lakh Games & Puzzles Real Estate Powered by India World HTCity Entertainment Trending Astrology Lifestyle Education Business Cities Latest News Shop Now Kolkata Doctor Rape Case Live Narendra Modi Ukraine Visit Live Videos Photos Web Stories Sports Delhi News Mumbai News Bengaluru News Technology Quickreads Daily Digest Following Games + 7 more Mumbai News Bengaluru News Technology Quickreads Daily Digest Following Games At Televised Meet, Putin's Scary Revelation; Alarmed UN Watchdog Rushes | Nuclear | Kursk | Ukraine world news Published on Aug 23, 2024 07:06 AM IST Follow Us Follow Us Share Via Copy Link Russian President Vladimir Putin on Aug 22 accused Ukraine of trying to attack the Kursk nuclear power station. "The enemy tried to strike the nuclear power plant at night, the International Atomic Energy Agency has been informed," Putin said in a televised government meeting. Watch here.
